text: The Battle of Geyve () was a small but decisive engagement fought during the Turkish War of Independence. Unlike other battles of the war, forces of the Grand National Assembly directly fought forces of the Constantinople government, which was under Allied occupation.Hilafet Ordusu ==References== Category:Conflicts in 1920 Category:Battles of the Turkish War of Independence Category:History of Sakarya Province Category:1920 in the Ottoman Empire Category:May 1920 events
title: Battle of Geyve
